question: Which of the following is the name of the World's Biggest Health Plan?
explanation: India will have the world's largest healthcare programme for half a billion of its poorest citizens. The plan was soon dubbed "NaMoCare" by BJP president Amit Shah and "ModiCare" by many online. The government's new national health protection scheme will cover 10 crore poor and vulnerable families. Each family would be entitled to up to Rs. 5 lakh every year.
